text:
Vulnerable people in Glasgow can now get free e-bus transport shuttles to #vaccine appointments thanks to @SPEnergynetwork's #GreenEconomyFund.

We worked with @GlasgowCC & @CTGlasgow in supporting the project delivery.

#Covid19 #ElectricVehicles #EVs #NetZero #Transport https://t.co/vXz9nelRk8
